text: E'i nabi muminadera kache tadera nijedera ceye'o adhika antaranga, ara tamra patnigana hacchena tadera mata. Ara garbhajata samparkadharira -- tara allahâ€Œra bidhane eke an'ye adhikatara nikatabarti muminadera o muhajiradera ca'ite, tabe tomara yena tomadera bandhubargera prati sadacara karo. Emanata'i granthe lipibad'dha rayeche.
